message.name: ERR_CASE_XRV_SAMEOWNER
message.locale: This user is already the assigned Case Owner.

message.name: ERR_CASE_XRV_SAMESUPERVISOR
message.locale: This user is already the assigned Case Supervisor.

message.name: INF_ASSIGNED_AS_CASE_OWNER
message.locale: Assigned role of case owner for case %1s of type %2s for %3s

message.name: INF_ASSIGNED_AS_CASE_OWNER_REASON
message.locale: You have been assigned the role of case owner for case %1s by %2s

message.name: INF_ASSIGNED_AS_CASE_SUPERVISOR
message.locale: Assigned role of case supervisor for case %1s of type %2s for %3s

message.name: INF_ASSIGNED_AS_CASE_SUPERVISOR_REASON
message.locale: You have been assigned the role of case supervisor for case %1s by %2s

message.name: INF_UNASSIGNED_AS_CASE_OWNER
message.locale: Role of case owner for case %1s of type %2s for %3s has been closed

message.name: INF_UNASSIGNED_AS_CASE_OWNER_REASON
message.locale: Your role as case owner for case %1s has been closed by %2s. The new case owner is %3s

message.name: INF_UNASSIGNED_AS_CASE_SUPERVISOR
message.locale: Role of case supervisor for case %1s of type %2s for %3s has been closed

message.name: INF_UNASSIGNED_AS_CASE_SUPERVISOR_REASON
message.locale: Your role as case supervisor for case %1s has been closed by %2s. The new case supervisor is %3s

message.name: ERR_CASE_FV_OWNER_INVALID
message.locale: Owner Name %1s is not a valid User.

message.name: ERR_CASE_FV_SUPERVISOR_INVALID
message.locale: Supervisor Name %1s is not a valid User.
